WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 07 September 2023
Condition of Rain:
Showers or thundershowers will occur at times in the sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to
Hambantota via Colombo, Galle and Matara.
Winds:
Winds will be south-westerly and speed will be (30-40) kmph.
Wind  speed  may  increase  up  to  (55-65)  kmph  at  times  in  the  sea  areas  off  the  coast  extending  from
Hambantota to Pottuvil and in the sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to Trincomalee via
Mannar and Kankasanthurai.
Wind speed may increase up to 50 kmph at times in the sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam
to Hambantota via Colombo and Galle.
State of Sea:
The sea areas off the coast extending from Hambantota to Pottuvil and in the sea areas off the coast
extending from Puttalam to Trincomalee via Mannar and Kankasanthurai can be very rough at times.
The sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to Hambantota via Colombo and Galle can be rough
at times.
Temporarily strong gusty winds and very rough seas can be expected during thundershowers.

Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
